Description: Small pottery goblet or jar with flat base and upright rim. Surfaces a dull red with half the diameter of the rim blackened by smoke.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House X-1 room 2 floor 1 floor 2
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p48)
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
